awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Jack Skellington, the pumpkin king of Halloween Town, is bored with doing the same thing every year for Halloween. One day he stumbles into Christmas Town, and is so taken with the idea of Christmas that he tries to get the resident bats, ghouls, and goblins of Halloween town to help him put on Christmas instead of Halloween -- but alas, they can't get it quite right.
plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.
title: The Nightmare Before Christmas

tomatoes.consensus: The Nightmare Before Christmas is a stunningly original and visually delightful work of stop-motion animation.

writers: Tim Burton (based on: a story and characters by)
